comments:
When I open the Parallel Development perspective, I get the following error appearing in the view:

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/ptp/core/IParallelModelListener

This is Platform 3.1RC3.

Starting ptp for the first time (new workspace) now gives the following error:

ava.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ptp.ui.views.ParallelNodeStatusView.setupMachineMenu(ParallelNodeStatusView.java:
628)
	at org.eclipse.ptp.ui.views.ParallelNodeStatusView.createControl(ParallelNodeStatusView.java:656)
	at org.eclipse.ptp.ui.views.ParallelNodeStatusView.createPartControl(ParallelNodeStatusView.java:858)

I presume this is because the preferences haven't been set to anything at this point. The view should 
check for this condition though and display a message telling the user to set the preference (or the 
preference should default to something)
Should be fixed now - actually, a few weeks ago.
